effect.black_white: Whenever this Pokémon's stats would be raised, they are instead lowered by the same amount, and vice versa.
effect.black_2_white_2: Whenever this Pokémon's stats would be raised, they are instead lowered by the same amount, and vice versa.

flavor_text.black_white: Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.
